page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TRUDY
page.content: My name is Trudy McConnell.Ilive at Glenshiel farm Darnaway.Everyday I get up at 8.00am and get changed and go down stairs and have my breakfast.Mun takes me to the end of the road and iwait for the bus to take me to school.At school we do lots of things and we havetwo breaks and lunch at school.When I get home I get changed then I go for a ride on my horse.When I get back I read for a while then I watch tv.I have tea and then I do the washing up thenI watch tv again and then I go to bed at 9.00pm.
